definitions.definition: undomesticated animals, especially mammals , birds , and fish , which live in the wild .
examples: This town offers wildlife tours where you can go and watch the bears, deer, wild rabbits and other creatures in their natural habitats.

definitions.definition: Living undomesticated organisms of all kinds.

main_definition: ( often attributive ) undomesticated animals, especially mammals , birds , and fish , which live in the wild .
secondary_definitions: Living undomesticated organisms of all kinds.
